dt.t: scientists working in {wi}partnership{/wi} with each other

dt: {bc}a legal relation existing between two or more persons contractually associated as joint principals in a business

dt: {bc}the persons joined together in a partnership

dt.t: the {wi}partnership{/wi} computes its net income … in a manner similar to that of an individual

dt: {bc}a relationship resembling a legal partnership and usually involving close cooperation between {a_link|parties} having specified and joint rights and responsibilities

dt.t: The band has maintained a successful {wi}partnership{/wi} for 10 years.

shortdef: the state of being a partner : participation
a legal relation existing between two or more persons contractually associated as joint principals in a business
the persons joined together in a partnership

dissolved the {wi}copartnership{/wi} due to financial difficulties

shortdef: the state or right of a copartner

dt: {bc}a company especially in a developing country that joins in a commercial venture with an international company
